text: "Man in the Box" is a 1991 song by Alice in Chains. It is the second single from their debut studio album Facelift. It went to number 18 on the Billboard Mainstream Rock chart. It was nominated for a Grammy Award in 1992. It was later included on their greatest hits compilation albums. ==References== Category:1991 songs Category:Alice in Chains songs Category:Alternative rock songs Category:Hard rock songs
title: Man in the Box
